entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
